name: dweebui
tagline: A customizable self-hosted dashboard for links, widgets, and status
description: DweebUI is a playful, customizable web dashboard for presenting information widgets, links, and status blocks. Itâ€™s designed for self-hosted homepages, homelabs, or personal start pages with a retro-inspired style.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Playful, retro-inspired interface design with customizable themes and nostalgic styling elements

features.title: Link Management
features.description: Organize frequently used links and bookmarks with custom icons and categorization options

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Drag-and-drop interface builder with flexible grid system and responsive design options

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Multiple built-in themes with support for custom CSS and color scheme modifications

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Fast loading times and keyboard shortcuts for efficient navigation and productivity
